CheckTitle: OpenSearch Domain should have at least three data nodes
Description: An OpenSearch domain requires at least three data nodes for high availability and fault-tolerance. Deploying an OpenSearch domain with at least three data nodes ensures cluster operations if a node fails.
Risk: A single point of failure exists in the OpenSearch domain, which can lead to data loss or service disruption.

Recommendation.Text: Configure the OpenSearch domain with at least three data nodes to ensure high availability and fault tolerance.
